Question.Subject: is this website real?
Question.Content: i got an add on msn and some person talks to me and she gives me this link.... i was wondering if this is real or a fraud... http://www.webcams.com/index.php?page=join_2 i no about the bots but this is an actual person... she emailed me pics.. except i dont find the pics real well atleast there from some model... but like i wudnt beleive it then she went on webcam for like 1 minute,... i still didnt beleive it now she keeps asking me to do the link... i no its not a bot but im just wondering if that link is fake...
Question.ChosenAnswer: That was a bot (computer) sending you spam. Just disregard it. The website is just like a porn site that wants you to pay to join.

Answer.Content: That was a bot (computer) sending you spam. Just disregard it. The website is just like a porn site that wants you to pay to join.
